survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
Si
awesome, let's get started! i'm at the starting point, next to a twig that leads to a small island with a tiger on it
which way should i go?
go towards the tiger
alrighty, i'm at the small island with the tiger now
where to next?
go to the island with a parrot
ok, i went south-west to the big island
met a parrot sitting on a tree, what now?
climb over the rocks to the island with a frog
Subí sobre las 3 rocas, cruzé un pequeño canal y aquí estoy al lado de una rana en una nueva isla
¿adónde desde aquí?
ve a la isla donde esta la giraffa
all right, i swam past the crocodile and around the big island and found my way to the giraffe west of the elephant
where do i go now?
go towards the island that has a snake on it
¡entiendo! Ahora estamos al sureste de la isla con la serpiente.
¿Dónde está la próxima parada?
go towards the treasure box
alright, i've taken 2 steps east and i see the treasure
we did it, friend! *finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
yes
perfect! let's start. from where you are, with the white dog, walk a bit to the left
do you see a wooden bench? go just below it. see the trail? cross it aiming towards the florist stand
i'm by the florist stand
great, but don't go towards the florist stand
make a 180 turn to your left, cross the trail again and head back towards the white dog. you got it!
i'm by the white dog with the picnic blanket
excellent! now, make your way south, just keep heading downwards
don't worry about touching the branch, it won't bite!
okay
look for a mat and a bowl of berrie. go over the mat, give the berries a little touch
now, let's head west. can you see another wooden branch?
yes under the deer?
exactly! cross this branch. no, not under the deer, not yet
we're moving up, towards north. keeping up?
ok made it cross the branch
fantastic! now dodge the green bush by circling it from the right side until you reach the florist stand again
ok dodged it and i'm by the florist stand
Genial, ahora gira a la izquierda.
¿Ves ese puesto debajo? Pasa por delante y continúa hacia el oeste hasta que veas un gran puente. ¡Pero no cruces el puente!
ok ya lo vi
muy bien, ahora sigue el camino pasando el puente hacia el oeste
verás a dos personas mayores sentadas en un banco, parece que están leyendo periódicos!
ya estoy con ellos
cool! now from that bench, take a few steps downwards, you'll see another wooden branch and a green bush
yes i see it
perfect, now squeeze between that branch and the bush and head east
ok
see that brown young deer after a few steps? that's where we're heading to
keep walking!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
Genial, estoy en la tienda ahora mismo.
¿Adónde vamos ahora?
camina para bajo en frente del perro
vale, pasé al perro
ahora veo un fuego a mi derecha y un hongo rojo a la izquierda. ¿hacia dónde?
camina entre el fuego y el pero
¡listo! ahora veo un coche azul
¿qué sigue?
camina hace el telescopio
Well, I'm at the telescope right now.
I see some rocks and a wooden house to the west. where I'm going?
go inside the house
alright, i'm inside the house now
*finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
awesome! step 1: walk under that first palm tree right in front of you, then make a right and stroll by the second tree
before you hit the third tree, take a sharp left and head south. go for it!
ok
nice! now, see that cute brown puppy over there? go left of the puppy, then slightly left before banking a right southwards
you're doing well!
pk
¡excelente! now, see those rocks over there? one's big and on your left, the other one's smaller and on your right
Dirígete entre ellos, justo hacia el océano.
ok
¡Frío! Ahora, enfréntate a ese gran cangrejo rojo y gira a la derecha.
Vas a ir junto a esa gran roca, en dirección oeste en el agua. ¡No te preocupes, no te mojarás demasiado!
ok
Genial, después de pasar por una roca de tamaño mediano, sentirás vibraciones de mandíbulas.
Verás un tiburón, pero no te preocupes. solo haz un giro brusco a la derecha
ok
¡bien hecho! time to dry off
head back onto land, weaving between the medium rock and a beach ball. continue heading north
ok
perfecto! close to that red tent and the large speaker, move slightly to the left and go northwest
ok
well done! Now, it surrounds the store in an arc and sees south towards the sea
ok
hold up! don't get your toes wet again
just before you hit the water turn right, go underneath the red kayak
